title: Aniki no Yome-san nara, Ore ni Hamerarete Hiihii Itteru Tokoro Da yo
synopsis: Two respected older brothers. Two beautiful, virtuous wives. The younger brother, a horndog who salivates at the chance to taste those wives.
related_anime: ['Aniki no Yomesan nara, Ore ni Hamerarete Hiihii Itteru Tokoro da yo']
